description:
Android developers are being urged to prepare for a pivotal enhancement to the ecosystem: the adoption of a 16 KB memory page size. This upgrade promises significant benefits, with performance gains of 5–10% across apps and games. While the transition represents a vital step forward in the evolution of Android, developers must take proactive measures... Read more »

The post Google urges Android developers to prep for 16 KB memory page appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google urges Android developers to prep for 16 KB memory page
